extendedInfo.description: ConnectCV lets you create an outstanding resume on mobile and web thatâs yours to love and use forever.The mobile app provides convenient access to the ever-popular ConnectCV resume builder and career management account.You can create, edit and share your resume via mobile as well as login online for a complete career management experience that offers the following free features:                                                                   Free Resume BuilderCreate a great resume in minutes without the guesswork with our customizable resume template, inbuilt spell-checker, inline writing tips and industry specific resume samples.Powerful, Feature RichEmployers are on the lookout for standout candidates. Your ConnectCV resume comes packed with features that are designed to get you noticedâ¦ and land you the interview.Total Privacy ControlConnectCVâs privacy choices give you total control over your information allowing you to choose between sharing your resume online, emailing a discreet weblink, or downloading in Word or PDF.Centralize your CareerManage all your career assets safely online in the one convenient location. Create and store Cover letters, job applications, upload videos, qualifications, photos and references.

reviews.title: PERFECT !
reviews.comment: I got a cheap Android phone and let me tell yuh this app worked perfect & made me a fancy resume :)
reviews.author: Jenny Marquez

reviews.title: Cv really easy to use great app
